pipeline.description: Core settings for the pipeline execution

max_workers.description: Number of concurrent worker processes for chunking/embedding

batch_size.description: Number of files to process per batch loop

force_full_scan.description: If true, ignores incremental diffs and forces a full re-process of the repository.

processing.description: Settings for code analysis and chunking

chunk_size.description: Maximum number of tokens per text chunk (CodeBERT limit is 512)

overlap.description: Number of tokens to overlap between chunks to preserve context

min_chunk_size.description: Minimum characters required to create a chunk (ignores tiny snippets)

enable_embeddings.description: Whether to generate vector embeddings using CodeBERT (Memory intensive)

base_path.description: Root directory for SQLite DBs and Vector indices (Relative to project root)
